subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra
description_text:
Dear team

First of all I would like to tell you since I don't have any regrets buying
these pedals and I highly recommend this article to all my friends who wish
to purchase a new pedals set.
During discussions with my friends about the settings, some of them said
they see the brake force displayed on the software. On my side, nothing
appears, which is quite strange. I've checked, and I have version 2.1.2,
and the firmware is up to date.
Do you have any idea why I don't see the brake force displayed on my brake
pedal?

Sincerely

Romain

[image: image.png]

[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Romain Roussel,  If you purchased the Pro X, our software does not currently support displaying weight in kg. The Pro X Ultra does support this feature. Since the Pro X is already on the market, modifying its firmware could affect existing customers, so we have conducted additional testing. Please provide your order number so we can assist you further.

Hello

Thank you for your answer
There is m'y order number #SSN1416, normal the pédales are Pro X ultra (the
one with RGB LED).

Thank you


Le mer. 17 déc. 2025, 03:50, service@simsonn.com

Hi Romain Roussel,  I checked your order and it appears that you purchased the ProX version. If this feature is important to you, we recommend upgrading to the ProX Ultra controller board. In addition to supporting force display in kg, it also supports bidirectional control of vibration motors and provides better compatibility and performance for voice coil motors.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51399342293306

Hi
There is something that I dont understand because it's look like I already
have the pro X ultra controller.




Le sam. 20 déc. 2025, 12:59, service@simsonn.com
Hi Romain Roussel, The ProX Ultra control board has been upgraded. The three pedals of the ProX Ultra feature panels with four screw holes, whereas the ProX panels only have two.

Thank you for the clarification.

I will check later if it's necessary from m'y side to upgrade the
controller.



Le sam. 20 déc. 2025, 13:30, service@simsonn.com
